Description: Glass ewer; blown; yellowish green fabric with wheel-cut decoration.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Konya (city), MLA register: "Kricor C. Kharaqhanzian says this piece was his & came from Konia, Karaman, Turkey".
Bibliographic references: Lamm 1929-1930 / Mittelalterliche Gläser und Steinschnittarbeiten aus dem Nahen Osten (pl.56.3)
